All Implemented Interfaces:
WordSenseOperator
public class Word2DotOperator
extends Word2Dot
implements WordSenseOperator

A word sense operator for generating a dot-formatted graph from a word sense and its expansions.

Author:
Spence Koehler

populateEdges in class Word2Dot

operate

public void operate(WordSenseWrapper childWrapper,
                    WordSenseWrapper parentWrapper)
             throws UnwindOperatorException
Operate on the given child (expanded) word sense wrapper.

The UnwindOperatorException is intended as a mechanism to halt recursive expansion. For example, if the target of a search is found, the exception can be thrown and the handleUnwind method will be called.

Specified by:
operate in interface WordSenseOperator
Throws:
UnwindOperatorException
